prompt: Prueba Técnica — SeatMapBuilder (Fanz). Desarrollar un editor visual interactivo para diseñar mapas de asientos. React + TypeScript + Next.js. MVP: Visualización, Gestión de filas/asientos, Etiquetado, Flujo completo desde sesión vacía con import/export JSON.

Create detailed implementation plan for SeatMapBuilder with: Stack selection (Next.js 16 + React 19 + TypeScript + Tailwind 4 + Zustand), Data structure design for Seat/Row/Area/Table, Component architecture, Canvas SVG approach, State management strategy
Install Zustand for state management in the Next.js project
Create folder structure for SeatMapBuilder: app/components/canvas, app/components/toolbar, app/components/inspector, app/components/modals, app/hooks, app/store, app/types, app/utils, app/lib

Create comprehensive TypeScript types for SeatMapBuilder including: SeatId, RowId, AreaId, TableId, Position, Size, SeatType, ElementStatus, Seat, Row, Area, Table, ToolType, SeatMapState, SeatMapActions, SeatMapStore

Implement complete Zustand store for SeatMapBuilder with all CRUD actions: addRow, removeRow, addArea, addTable, selectElement, deleteSelected, setZoom, setPan, exportMap, importMap, resetMap, bulk labeling with patterns
Create Seat component with different types (seat, vip, wheelchair, companion), proper SVG rendering, selection states, hover effects
Create Row component that renders a group of seats with label, connection line, and selection highlight
Create Area component for rendering rectangular sections with labels and colors
Create Table component supporting round and rectangular shapes with seats positioned around them
Create SeatMapCanvas component with SVG, zoom/pan functionality, tool-based interaction (select, addRow, addArea, addTable, pan), shift+click multi-selection, wheel zoom
Create Toolbar component with tool buttons, zoom controls, New Map, Export JSON, Import JSON, and Delete Selected functionality
Create InspectorPanel component with map name editor, selection info, properties editor for labels and seat types, bulk labeling patterns
Replace default Next.js page with SeatMapBuilder main page integrating Toolbar, SeatMapCanvas, and InspectorPanel
Write comprehensive README.md with setup instructions, technical decisions, data structure, features implemented, controls, assumptions, and project structure

Add three new features to SeatMapBuilder: 1) Remove grid background from canvas, 2) Implement section system for seats - when creating rows, allow assigning/creating sections with name, color, section number, and price. Seats inherit section color. Show hover tooltip displaying Section/Row/Seat/Price like Seats.io, 3) Add width, height, and color inputs to CreateAreaModal
notes: Created Section type, updated CreateRowModal with section selection, created CreateAreaModal, updated Seat component with section colors and hover tooltip

prompt: Remove row labels from canvas display - the A, B, C labels on rows are not needed visually on the canvas
notes: Removed label text element from Row.tsx component

prompt: Add spacebar temporary pan mode - when holding spacebar, switch to pan tool, and when releasing, return to previous tool
notes: Added isSpacePressed and previousTool state in SeatMapCanvas, modified keyboard event handlers

prompt: Add multi-element drag support - when multiple elements are selected, dragging one should move all selected elements together
notes: Modified handleMouseMove to iterate through selectedIds and call appropriate move actions for each element type

prompt: Add box selection feature - when using select tool, allow click and drag on empty canvas to draw a selection box and select all elements inside it
notes: Added isBoxSelecting state, boxStart/boxEnd coordinates, box selection rectangle rendering, and selection logic in handleMouseUp

prompt: Add edit functionality for selected elements - allow editing single items or multiple items from the same section only. Create EditSelectionModal with label editing, seat type selection, and section assignment. Also save all prompts from this session to prompts.jsonl
notes: Created EditSelectionModal component, added canEdit() logic in Toolbar for same-section validation, added Edit button to Toolbar

prompt: Update README.md to be in English. Check that the prompt is added to prompts.jsonl and add it.
notes: Translated README.md from Spanish to English, added prompt to prompts.jsonl

prompt: Refine the UI to be minimal and modern like Excalidraw: 1) Tooltips for top buttons should appear below, bottom tooltips stay as is, 2) Remove hamburger menu and add Edit option to context menu instead, 3) Implement dark/light mode theme toggle with persistence, 4) Make all modals theme-aware with useThemeColors hook
notes: Created Tooltip, FloatingToolbar, FileActions, ThemeToggle, ZoomControls, HelpButton components. Created themeStore and useThemeColors hook. Updated all modals to be theme-aware. Removed MenuButton, integrated edit into ContextMenu.

prompt: Fix theme issues: 1) Move ThemeToggle to top-left, 2) Update all modals to use selected button colors (purple/violet in dark mode), 3) Make Seat hover tooltip theme-aware, 4) Update HelpModal to show actual Lucide icons instead of text labels
notes: Updated useThemeColors with selectedBg/selectedBorder/selectedText. Applied to all modals. Updated Seat.tsx hover tooltip colors. HelpButton now imports and displays actual Lucide icons.

prompt: Fix remaining UI issues: 1) + Add Row button color in dark mode, 2) EditSelectionModal should be theme-aware (currently always light), 3) Add Structure modal styles should match other modals, 4) In Add Row modal, price input should not overlap with color input - stack them vertically
notes: Fixed CreateMultipleRowsModal Add Row button to use selectedBg. Updated EditSelectionModal with useThemeColors. Standardized CreateStructureModal styling. Changed price input layout from grid to vertical stack.

prompt: quiero que agregues que cuando apreto delete en el popup del click derecho me aparezca un modal de confirmation
notes: Integrated ConfirmationModal in context menu delete flow and required explicit confirm before deletion.

prompt: el delete modal no tiene dark mode agregaselo
notes: Updated ConfirmationModal to use theme tokens from useThemeColors for dark/light mode support.

prompt: add this prompts to prompts.jsonl
notes: Added latest session prompts to prompts.jsonl following existing JSONL schema.

prompt: excelente, algo que me gustaría agregar es que cuando edito toda la row completa pueda indicarle la section del seat, y el precio de toda la row, actualmente se puede hacer en un seat individual pero no en un row completa, me gustaría eso para facilitar poner precio a rows de seats
notes: Implemented row-level bulk seat price editing and section propagation from EditSelectionModal.
